data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 14, Penalty! Gavin Ward points to the spot, great chance for Reading...
He's off! Ryan Yates is shown a red card.
Lucas Joao converts the penalty to give Reading a 1-0 lead.
The first-half has come to a close in Reading.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Chris Hughton (Nottingham) is making a first substitution, with Tobias Figueiredo replacing Scott McKenna.
Michael Morrison scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
In the minute 53, Great play from Michael Olise to set up the goal.
Samba Sow is replacing Harry Arter for the away team.
Nottingham make their third substitution with Sammy Ameobi replacing Anthony Knockaert.
In the minute 71, Will Swan is replacing Lyle Taylor for Nottingham at Madejski Stadium.
The home team replace Yakou Meite with Alfa Semedo.
Veljko Paunovic is making the team's second substitution at Madejski Stadium with Sone Aluko replacing Michael Olise.
In the minute 82, Omar Richards for Reading has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
Tomas Esteves is on a sub for Ovie Ejaria for Reading.
The home team have replaced Omar Richards with Sam Baldock. This is the fourth substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
In the minute 86, Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a fifth substitution, with Lewis Gibson replacing Lucas Joao.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Cafu is booked for the away team.
